alert.note: Alert for Alfalfa; Garfield; Grant; Kay; Major; Noble (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 3:12AM CDT until August 06 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Kay County in northern Oklahoma... Northwestern Noble County in northern Oklahoma... Southeastern Alfalfa County in northwestern Oklahoma... Grant County in northern Oklahoma... Garfield County in northern Oklahoma... Northeastern Major County in northwestern Oklahoma... * Until 345 AM CDT. * At 311 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jefferson, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Enid, Blackwell, Tonkawa, Medford, Waukomis, Pond Creek, Garber, Lahoma, Covington, Billings, Ringwood, Lamont, Wakita, Kremlin, Goltry, Breckenridge, Meno, Braman, Nash, and Hunter. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Alfalfa; Garfield; Grant; Kay; Major; Noble
